Description: Picture a magnificent Silver Spring, Maryland senior apartment community for active adults age 62 or over, in a premier residential neighborhood surrounded by outdoor recreation, inviting plazas, and walkways. Imagine a setting alive with things to do in state-of-the-art facilities, like a 48-seat theater and multi-purpose entertainment center, sun-filled social lounges, a fitness center, computer and billiards room, and more. Next, add the peace of mind of a controlled-entry environment and the luxury of amenity-filled, one and two bedroom apartments, and you’ll arrive at Randolph Village. Bring your pets with you and enjoy the smoke-free environment. Come, discover Randolph Village, a thriving community that over 130 seniors call home; where a lifestyle rich in amenities is more than just a dream; it’s an affordable reality.
